title: Al Jazeera
summary: Al Jazeera (Arabic: الجزيرة‎, romanized: al-jazīrah, IPA: [æl (d)ʒæˈziːrɐ], literally "The Island", referring to the Arabian Peninsula in context)[3] is  a Qatari government-funded international Arabic news channel based in Doha, Qatar, and operated by the media conglomerate Al Jazeera Media Network. The flagship of the network, its station identification is Al Jazeera.
